counter.name: ConsumedCount
counter.summary: The number of times the link reader has consumed a fragment.

counter.name: ConsumedSizeBytes
counter.summary: The total number of bytes read by the link consumer.

counter.name: FilteredCount
counter.summary: The number of fragments that were filtered and not consumed.

counter.name: FilteredSizeBytes
counter.summary: The total number of bytes read by the link consumer that were filtered.

counter.name: OverrunPollingCount
counter.summary: The number of times the link has been overrun while polling.

counter.name: OverrunPollingFragCount
counter.summary: The number of fragments the link has not processed because it was overrun while polling.

counter.name: OverrunReadingCount
counter.summary: The number of input overruns detected while reading metadata by the consumer.

counter.name: OverrunReadingFragCount
counter.summary: The number of fragments the link has not processed because it was overrun while reading.

counter.name: SlowCount
counter.summary: The number of times the consumer was detected as rate limiting consumer by the producer.

gauge.name: Pid
gauge.summary: The process ID of the tile.

gauge.name: Tid
gauge.summary: The thread ID of the tile. Always the same as the Pid in production, but might be different in development.

counter.name: ContextSwitchInvoluntaryCount
counter.summary: The number of involuntary context switches.

counter.name: ContextSwitchVoluntaryCount
counter.summary: The number of voluntary context switches.

gauge.name: Status
gauge.summary: The current status of the tile. 0 is booting, 1 is running. 2 is shutdown

gauge.name: Heartbeat
gauge.summary: The last UNIX timestamp in nanoseconds that the tile heartbeated.

gauge.name: InBackpressure
gauge.summary: Whether the tile is currently backpressured or not, either 1 or 0.

counter.name: BackpressureCount
counter.summary: Number of times the tile has had to wait for one of more consumers to catch up to resume publishing.

counter.name: RegimeDurationNanos
counter.summary: Mutually exclusive and exhaustive duration of time the tile spent in each of the regimes.

counter.name: RxPktCnt
counter.summary: Packet receive count.

counter.name: RxBytesTotal
counter.summary: Total number of bytes received (including Ethernet header).

counter.name: RxUnderszCnt
counter.summary: Number of incoming packets dropped due to being too small.

counter.name: RxFillBlockedCnt
counter.summary: Number of incoming packets dropped due to fill ring being full.

counter.name: RxBackpressureCnt
counter.summary: Number of incoming packets dropped due to backpressure.

gauge.name: RxBusyCnt
gauge.summary: Number of receive buffers currently busy.

gauge.name: RxIdleCnt
gauge.summary: Number of receive buffers currently idle.

counter.name: TxSubmitCnt
counter.summary: Number of packet transmit jobs submitted.

counter.name: TxCompleteCnt
counter.summary: Number of packet transmit jobs marked as completed by the kernel.

counter.name: TxBytesTotal
counter.summary: Total number of bytes transmitted (including Ethernet header).

counter.name: TxRouteFailCnt
counter.summary: Number of packet transmit jobs dropped due to route failure.

counter.name: TxNeighborFailCnt
counter.summary: Number of packet transmit jobs dropped due to unresolved neighbor.

counter.name: TxFullFailCnt
counter.summary: Number of packet transmit jobs dropped due to XDP TX ring full or missing completions.

gauge.name: TxBusyCnt
gauge.summary: Number of transmit buffers currently busy.

gauge.name: TxIdleCnt
gauge.summary: Number of transmit buffers currently idle.

counter.name: XskTxWakeupCnt
counter.summary: Number of XSK sendto syscalls dispatched.

counter.name: XskRxWakeupCnt
counter.summary: Number of XSK recvmsg syscalls dispatched.

counter.name: XdpRxDroppedOther
counter.summary: xdp_statistics_v0.rx_dropped: Dropped for other reasons

counter.name: XdpRxInvalidDescs
counter.summary: xdp_statistics_v0.rx_invalid_descs: Dropped due to invalid descriptor

counter.name: XdpTxInvalidDescs
counter.summary: xdp_statistics_v0.tx_invalid_descs: Dropped due to invalid descriptor

counter.name: XdpRxRingFull
counter.summary: xdp_statistics_v1.rx_ring_full: Dropped due to rx ring being full

counter.name: XdpRxFillRingEmptyDescs
counter.summary: xdp_statistics_v1.rx_fill_ring_empty_descs: Failed to retrieve item from fill ring

counter.name: XdpTxRingEmptyDescs
counter.summary: xdp_statistics_v1.tx_ring_empty_descs: Failed to retrieve item from tx ring

counter.name: RxGreCnt
counter.summary: Number of valid GRE packets received

counter.name: RxGreInvalidCnt
counter.summary: Number of invalid GRE packets received

counter.name: RxGreIgnoredCnt
counter.summary: Number of received but ignored GRE packets

counter.name: TxGreCnt
counter.summary: Number of GRE packet transmit jobs submitted

counter.name: TxGreRouteFailCnt
counter.summary: Number of GRE packets transmit jobs dropped due to route failure

counter.name: SyscallsSendmmsg
counter.summary: Number of sendmmsg syscalls dispatched

counter.name: SyscallsRecvmmsg
counter.summary: Number of recvmsg syscalls dispatched

counter.name: RxPktCnt
counter.summary: Number of packets received

counter.name: TxPktCnt
counter.summary: Number of packets sent

counter.name: TxDropCnt
counter.summary: Number of packets failed to send

counter.name: TxBytesTotal
counter.summary: Total number of bytes transmitted (including Ethernet header).

counter.name: RxBytesTotal
counter.summary: Total number of bytes received (including Ethernet header).

counter.name: TxnsOverrun
counter.summary: Count of txns overrun before reassembled (too small txn_reassembly_count).

counter.name: TxnReasmsStarted
counter.summary: Count of fragmented txn receive ops started.

gauge.name: TxnReasmsActive
gauge.summary: Number of fragmented txn receive ops currently active.

counter.name: FragsOk
counter.summary: Count of txn frags received

counter.name: FragsGap
counter.summary: Count of txn frags dropped due to data gap

counter.name: FragsDup
counter.summary: Count of txn frags dropped due to dup (stream already completed)

counter.name: TxnsReceived
counter.summary: Count of txns received via TPU.

counter.name: TxnsAbandoned
counter.summary: Count of txns abandoned because a conn was lost.

counter.name: TxnUndersz
counter.summary: Count of txns received via QUIC dropped because they were too small.

counter.name: TxnOversz
counter.summary: Count of txns received via QUIC dropped because they were too large.

counter.name: LegacyTxnUndersz
counter.summary: Count of packets received on the non-QUIC port that were too small to be a valid IP packet.

counter.name: LegacyTxnOversz
counter.summary: Count of packets received on the non-QUIC port that were too large to be a valid transaction.

counter.name: ReceivedPackets
counter.summary: Number of IP packets received.

counter.name: ReceivedBytes
counter.summary: Total bytes received (including IP, UDP, QUIC headers).

counter.name: SentPackets
counter.summary: Number of IP packets sent.

counter.name: SentBytes
counter.summary: Total bytes sent (including IP, UDP, QUIC headers).

gauge.name: ConnectionsAlloc
gauge.summary: The number of currently allocated QUIC connections.

gauge.name: ConnectionsState
gauge.summary: The number of QUIC connections in each state.

counter.name: ConnectionsCreated
counter.summary: The total number of connections that have been created.

counter.name: ConnectionsClosed
counter.summary: Number of connections gracefully closed.

counter.name: ConnectionsAborted
counter.summary: Number of connections aborted.

counter.name: ConnectionsTimedOut
counter.summary: Number of connections timed out.

counter.name: ConnectionsRetried
counter.summary: Number of connections established with retry.

counter.name: ConnectionErrorNoSlots
counter.summary: Number of connections that failed to create due to lack of slots.

counter.name: ConnectionErrorRetryFail
counter.summary: Number of connections that failed during retry (e.g. invalid token).

counter.name: PktNoConn
counter.summary: Number of packets with an unknown connection ID.

counter.name: FrameTxAlloc
counter.summary: Results of attempts to acquire QUIC frame metadata.

counter.name: InitialTokenLen
counter.summary: Number of Initial packets grouped by token length.

counter.name: HandshakesCreated
counter.summary: Number of handshake flows created.

counter.name: HandshakeErrorAllocFail
counter.summary: Number of handshakes dropped due to alloc fail.

counter.name: HandshakeEvicted
counter.summary: Number of handshakes dropped due to eviction.

counter.name: StreamReceivedEvents
counter.summary: Number of stream RX events.

counter.name: StreamReceivedBytes
counter.summary: Total stream payload bytes received.

counter.name: ReceivedFrames
counter.summary: Number of QUIC frames received.

counter.name: AckTx
counter.summary: ACK events

histogram.name: ServiceDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration spent in service

histogram.name: ReceiveDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration spent processing packets

counter.name: FrameFailParse
counter.summary: Number of QUIC frames failed to parse.

counter.name: PktCryptoFailed
counter.summary: Number of packets that failed decryption.

counter.name: PktNoKey
counter.summary: Number of packets that failed decryption due to missing key.

counter.name: PktNetHeaderInvalid
counter.summary: Number of packets dropped due to weird IP or UDP header.

counter.name: PktQuicHeaderInvalid
counter.summary: Number of packets dropped due to weird QUIC header.

counter.name: PktUndersz
counter.summary: Number of QUIC packets dropped due to being too small.

counter.name: PktOversz
counter.summary: Number of QUIC packets dropped due to being too large.

counter.name: PktVerneg
counter.summary: Number of QUIC version negotiation packets received.

counter.name: RetrySent
counter.summary: Number of QUIC Retry packets sent.

counter.name: PktRetransmissions
counter.summary: Number of QUIC packets that retransmitted.

counter.name: LeaderNotFound
counter.summary: Total number of times slot leader not found

counter.name: UnstakedCi
counter.summary: Total number of times we received contact info for an unstaked node

counter.name: CiRemoved
counter.summary: Total number of times we removed contact info

counter.name: NewContactInfoQuicVote
counter.summary: Total number of contact infos received and handled for QUIC Vote port

counter.name: NewContactInfoQuicTpu
counter.summary: Total number of contact infos received and handled for QUIC TPU port

counter.name: NewContactInfoUdpVote
counter.summary: Total number of contact infos received and handled for UDP Vote port

counter.name: NewContactInfoUdpTpu
counter.summary: Total number of contact infos received and handled for UDP TPU port

counter.name: SendResultQuicVote
counter.summary: Total count of results from trying to send via QUIC Vote port

counter.name: SendResultQuicTpu
counter.summary: Total count of results from trying to send via QUIC TPU port

counter.name: SendResultUdpVote
counter.summary: Total count of results from trying to send via UDP Vote port

counter.name: SendResultUdpTpu
counter.summary: Total count of results from trying to send via UDP TPU port

counter.name: EnsureConnResultQuicVote
counter.summary: Total count of results from trying to ensure a connection for a leader for QUIC Vote port

counter.name: EnsureConnResultQuicTpu
counter.summary: Total count of results from trying to ensure a connection for a leader for QUIC TPU port

counter.name: HandshakeComplete
counter.summary: Total number of times we completed a handshake

counter.name: QuicConnFinal
counter.summary: Total number of times QUIC connection closed

counter.name: ReceivedPackets
counter.summary: Total count of QUIC packets received

counter.name: ReceivedBytes
counter.summary: Total bytes received via QUIC

counter.name: SentPackets
counter.summary: Total count of QUIC packets sent

counter.name: SentBytes
counter.summary: Total bytes sent via QUIC

counter.name: RetrySent
counter.summary: Total count of QUIC retry packets sent

gauge.name: ConnectionsAlloc
gauge.summary: Number of currently allocated QUIC connections

gauge.name: ConnectionsState
gauge.summary: Number of QUIC connections in each state

counter.name: ConnectionsCreated
counter.summary: Total count of QUIC connections created

counter.name: ConnectionsClosed
counter.summary: Total count of QUIC connections closed

counter.name: ConnectionsAborted
counter.summary: Total count of QUIC connections aborted

counter.name: ConnectionsTimedOut
counter.summary: Total count of QUIC connections timed out

counter.name: ConnectionsRetried
counter.summary: Total count of QUIC connections retried

counter.name: ConnectionErrorNoSlots
counter.summary: Total count of connection errors due to no slots

counter.name: ConnectionErrorRetryFail
counter.summary: Total count of connection retry failures

counter.name: PktCryptoFailed
counter.summary: Total count of packets with crypto failures

counter.name: PktNoKey
counter.summary: Total count of packets with no key

counter.name: PktNoConn
counter.summary: Total count of packets with no connection

counter.name: PktTxAllocFail
counter.summary: Total count of packet TX allocation failures

counter.name: PktNetHeaderInvalid
counter.summary: Total count of packets with invalid network headers

counter.name: PktQuicHeaderInvalid
counter.summary: Total count of packets with invalid QUIC headers

counter.name: PktUndersz
counter.summary: Total count of undersized packets

counter.name: PktOversz
counter.summary: Total count of oversized packets

counter.name: PktVerneg
counter.summary: Total count of version negotiation packets

counter.name: PktRetransmissions
counter.summary: Total count of QUIC packet retransmissions.

counter.name: HandshakesCreated
counter.summary: Total count of QUIC handshakes created

counter.name: HandshakeErrorAllocFail
counter.summary: Total count of handshake allocation failures

counter.name: HandshakeEvicted
counter.summary: Total count of handshakes evicted

counter.name: StreamReceivedEvents
counter.summary: Total count of stream events received

counter.name: StreamReceivedBytes
counter.summary: Total bytes received via streams

counter.name: ReceivedFrames
counter.summary: Total count of QUIC frames received

counter.name: FrameFailParse
counter.summary: Total count of frame parse failures

counter.name: FrameTxAlloc
counter.summary: Results of attempts to acquire QUIC frame metadata.

counter.name: AckTx
counter.summary: Total count of ACK frames transmitted

histogram.name: ServiceDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration spent in service

histogram.name: ReceiveDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration spent processing packets

histogram.name: SignDurationNanos
histogram.summary: Duration spent waiting for tls_cv signatures

int.name: NoFeeInfo
int.label: Bundle dropped due to missing fee info

counter.name: TransactionReceived
counter.summary: Total count of transactions received, including transactions within bundles

counter.name: PacketReceived
counter.summary: Total count of packets received

counter.name: BundleReceived
counter.summary: Total count of bundles received

counter.name: Errors
counter.summary: Number of gRPC errors encountered

gauge.name: HeapSize
gauge.summary: Workspace heap size

gauge.name: HeapFreeBytes
gauge.summary: Approx free space in workspace

counter.name: ShredstreamHeartbeats
counter.summary: Number of ShredStream heartbeats successfully sent

counter.name: Keepalives
counter.summary: Number of HTTP/2 PINGs acknowledged by server

gauge.name: Connected
gauge.summary: 1 if connected to the bundle server, 0 if not

gauge.name: RttSample
gauge.summary: Latest RTT sample at scrape time (nanoseconds)

gauge.name: RttSmoothed
gauge.summary: RTT moving average (nanoseconds)

gauge.name: RttVar
gauge.summary: RTT variance (nanoseconds)

histogram.name: MessageRxDelayNanos
histogram.summary: Message receive delay in nanoseconds from bundle server to bundle client

counter.name: TransactionBundlePeerFailure
counter.summary: Count of transactions that failed to verify because a peer transaction in the bundle failed

counter.name: TransactionParseFailure
counter.summary: Count of transactions that failed to parse

counter.name: TransactionDedupFailure
counter.summary: Count of transactions that failed to deduplicate in the verify stage

counter.name: TransactionVerifyFailure
counter.summary: Count of transactions that failed to deduplicate in the verify stage

counter.name: GossipedVotesReceived
counter.summary: Count of simple vote transactions received over gossip instead of via the normal TPU path

counter.name: TransactionBundlePeerFailure
counter.summary: Count of transactions that failed to dedup because a peer transaction in the bundle failed

counter.name: TransactionDedupFailure
counter.summary: Count of transactions that failed to deduplicate in the dedup stage

counter.name: GossipedVotesReceived
counter.summary: Count of simple vote transactions received over gossip instead of via the normal TPU path

int.name: InvalidLookupIndex
int.label: The transaction referenced an index in a LUT that didn't exist

int.name: AccountUninitialized
int.label: The account referenced as a LUT hasn't been initialized

int.name: InvalidAccountData
int.label: The account referenced as a LUT couldn't be parsed

int.name: InvalidAccountOwner
int.label: The account referenced as a LUT wasn't owned by the ALUT program ID

int.name: AccountNotFound
int.label: The account referenced as a LUT couldn't be found

int.name: Inserted
int.label: A transaction with an unknown blockhash was added to the stash

int.name: Overrun
int.label: A transaction with an unknown blockhash was dropped because the stash was full

int.name: Published
int.label: A transaction with an unknown blockhash was published as the blockhash became known

int.name: Removed
int.label: A transaction with an unknown blockhash was removed from the stash without publishing, due to a bad LUT resolved failure, or no bank. These errors are double counted with the respective metrics for those categories.

counter.name: NoBankDrop
counter.summary: Count of transactions dropped because the bank was not available

counter.name: StashOperation
counter.summary: Count of operations that happened on the transaction stash

counter.name: LutResolved
counter.summary: Count of address lookup tables resolved

counter.name: BlockhashExpired
counter.summary: Count of transactions that failed to resolve because the blockhash was expired

counter.name: TransactionBundlePeerFailure
counter.summary: Count of transactions that failed to resolve because a peer transaction in the bundle failed

counter.name: DbRaces
counter.summary: Number of database races encountered (diagnostic counter, not indicative of issues)

counter.name: NoBankDrop
counter.summary: Count of transactions dropped because the bank was not available

counter.name: StashOperation
counter.summary: Count of operations that happened on the transaction stash

counter.name: LutResolved
counter.summary: Count of address lookup tables resolved

counter.name: BlockhashExpired
counter.summary: Count of transactions that failed to resolve because the blockhash was expired

counter.name: TransactionBundlePeerFailure
counter.summary: Count of transactions that failed to resolve because a peer transaction in the bundle failed

int.name: NonceConflict
int.label: Bundle with two conflicting durable nonce transactions

int.name: BundleBlacklist
int.label: Transaction uses an account on the bundle blacklist

int.name: InvalidNonce
int.label: Transaction is an invalid durable nonce transaction

int.name: WriteSysvar
int.label: Transaction tries to write to a sysvar

int.name: EstimationFail
int.label: Estimating compute cost and/or fee failed

int.name: DuplicateAccount
int.label: Transaction included an account address twice

int.name: TooManyAccounts
int.label: Transaction tried to load too many accounts

int.name: AddrLut
int.label: Transaction loaded accounts from a lookup table

int.name: Unaffordable
int.label: Fee payer's balance below transaction fee

int.name: Duplicate
int.label: Pack aware of transaction with same signature

int.name: NoncePriority
int.label: Transaction's fee was too low given its compute unit requirement and another competing transactions that uses the same durable nonce

int.name: Priority
int.label: Transaction's fee was too low given its compute unit requirement and other competing transactions

int.name: NonvoteAdd
int.label: Transaction that was not a simple vote added to pending transactions

int.name: VoteAdd
int.label: Simple vote transaction was added to pending transactions

int.name: NonvoteReplace
int.label: Transaction that was not a simple vote replaced a lower priority transaction

int.name: VoteReplace
int.label: Simple vote transaction replaced a lower priority transaction

int.name: NonceNonvoteAdd
int.label: Durable nonce transaction added to pending transactions

int.name: Unused
int.label: Unused because durable nonce transactions can't be simple votes

int.name: NonceNonvoteReplace
int.label: Durable nonce transaction replaced a lower priority transaction, likely one that uses the same durable nonce

int.name: Taken
int.label: Pack included the transaction in the microblock

int.name: CuLimit
int.label: Pack skipped the transaction because it would have exceeded the block CU limit

int.name: FastPath
int.label: Pack skipped the transaction because of account conflicts using the fast bitvector check

int.name: ByteLimit
int.label: Pack skipped the transaction because it would have exceeded the block data size limit

int.name: WriteCost
int.label: Pack skipped the transaction because it would have caused a writable account to exceed the per-account block write cost limit

int.name: SlowPath
int.label: Pack skipped the transaction because of account conflicts using the full slow check

int.name: DeferSkip
int.label: Pack skipped the transaction it previously exceeded the per-account block write cost limit too many times

int.name: NoTxnNoBankNoLeaderNoMicroblock
int.label: Pack had no transactions available, and wasn't leader

int.name: TxnNoBankNoLeaderNoMicroblock
int.label: Pack had transactions available, but wasn't leader or had hit a limit

int.name: NoTxnBankNoLeaderNoMicroblock
int.label: Pack had no transactions available, had banks but wasn't leader

int.name: TxnBankNoLeaderNoMicroblock
int.label: Pack had transactions available, had banks but wasn't leader

int.name: NoTxnNoBankLeaderNoMicroblock
int.label: Pack had no transactions available, and was leader but had no available banks

int.name: TxnNoBankLeaderNoMicroblock
int.label: Pack had transactions available, was leader, but had no available banks

int.name: NoTxnBankLeaderNoMicroblock
int.label: Pack had available banks but no transactions

int.name: TxnBankLeaderNoMicroblock
int.label: Pack had banks and transactions available but couldn't schedule anything non-conflicting

int.name: NoTxnNoBankNoLeaderMicroblock
int.label: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock while not leader

int.name: TxnNoBankNoLeaderMicroblock
int.label: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock while not leader

int.name: NoTxnBankNoLeaderMicroblock
int.label: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock while not leader

int.name: TxnBankNoLeaderMicroblock
int.label: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock while not leader

int.name: NoTxnNoBankLeaderMicroblock
int.label: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock but all banks were busy

int.name: TxnNoBankLeaderMicroblock
int.label: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock but all banks were busy

int.name: NoTxnBankLeaderMicroblock
int.label: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock and now has no transactions

int.name: Conflicting
int.label: Non-votes that write to a hotly-contended account

int.name: Bundles
int.label: Transactions that are part of a bundle

int.name: NotNeeded
int.label: On-chain state in the correct state

int.name: Inserted
int.label: Inserted an initializer bundle to update the on-chain state

int.name: CreationFailed
int.label: Tried to insert an initializer bundle to update the on-chain state, but creation failed

int.name: InsertionFailed
int.label: Tried to insert an initializer bundle to update the on-chain state, but insertion failed

histogram.name: ScheduleMicroblockDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of scheduling one microblock

histogram.name: NoSchedMicroblockDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of discovering that there are no schedulable transactions

histogram.name: InsertTransactionDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of inserting one transaction into the pool of available transactions

histogram.name: CompleteMicroblockDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of the computation associated with marking one microblock as complete

histogram.name: TotalTransactionsPerMicroblockCount
histogram.summary: Count of transactions in a scheduled microblock, including both votes and non-votes

histogram.name: VotesPerMicroblockCount
histogram.summary: Count of simple vote transactions in a scheduled microblock

counter.name: NormalTransactionReceived
counter.summary: Count of transactions received via the normal TPU path

counter.name: TransactionInserted
counter.summary: Result of inserting a transaction into the pack object

counter.name: MetricTiming
counter.summary: Time in nanos spent in each state

counter.name: TransactionDroppedFromExtra
counter.summary: Transactions dropped from the extra transaction storage because it was full

counter.name: TransactionInsertedToExtra
counter.summary: Transactions inserted into the extra transaction storage because pack's primary storage was full

counter.name: TransactionInsertedFromExtra
counter.summary: Transactions pulled from the extra transaction storage and inserted into pack's primary storage

counter.name: TransactionExpired
counter.summary: Transactions deleted from pack because their TTL expired

counter.name: TransactionDeleted
counter.summary: Transactions dropped from pack because they were requested to be deleted

counter.name: TransactionAlreadyExecuted
counter.summary: Transactions dropped from pack because they were already executed (in either the replay or leader pipeline)

counter.name: TransactionDroppedPartialBundle
counter.summary: Transactions dropped from pack because they were part of a partial bundle

gauge.name: AvailableTransactions
gauge.summary: The total number of pending transactions in pack's pool that are available to be scheduled

gauge.name: PendingTransactionsHeapSize
gauge.summary: The maximum number of pending transactions that pack can consider. This value is fixed at Firedancer startup but is a useful reference for AvailableTransactions.

gauge.name: SmallestPendingTransaction
gauge.summary: A lower bound on the smallest non-vote transaction (in cost units) that is immediately available for scheduling

counter.name: MicroblockPerBlockLimit
counter.summary: The number of times pack did not pack a microblock because the limit on microblocks/block had been reached

counter.name: DataPerBlockLimit
counter.summary: The number of times pack did not pack a microblock because it reached the data per block limit at the start of trying to schedule a microblock

counter.name: TransactionSchedule
counter.summary: Result of trying to consider a transaction for scheduling

counter.name: BundleCrankStatus
counter.summary: Result of considering whether bundle cranks are needed

gauge.name: CusConsumedInBlock
gauge.summary: The number of cost units consumed in the current block, or 0 if pack is not currently packing a block

histogram.name: CusScheduled
histogram.summary: The number of cost units scheduled for each block pack produced. This can be higher than the block limit because of returned CUs.

histogram.name: CusRebated
histogram.summary: The number of compute units rebated for each block pack produced. Compute units are rebated when a transaction fails prior to execution or requests more compute units than it uses.

histogram.name: CusNet
histogram.summary: The net number of cost units (scheduled - rebated) in each block pack produced.

histogram.name: CusPct
histogram.summary: The percent of the total block cost limit used for each block pack produced.

counter.name: DeleteMissed
counter.summary: Count of attempts to delete a transaction that wasn't found

counter.name: DeleteHit
counter.summary: Count of attempts to delete a transaction that was found and deleted

int.name: SlotHashesSysvarNotFound
int.label: The slot hashes syvar could not be found.

int.name: AccountNotFound
int.label: The account storing the address lookup table was deactivated or could not be found.

int.name: InvalidAccountOwner
int.label: The account that owns the referenced lookup table is not the address lookup table program.

int.name: InvalidAccountData
int.label: The data for the referenced address lookup table is malformed.

int.name: InvalidIndex
int.label: The referenced index in the address lookup table does not exist.

int.name: AccountInUse
int.label: An account is already being processed in another transaction in a way that does not support parallelism.

int.name: AccountLoadedTwice
int.label: A `Pubkey` appears twice in the transaction's `account_keys`. Instructions can reference `Pubkey`s more than once but the message must contain a list with no duplicate keys.

int.name: AccountNotFound
int.label: Attempt to debit an account but found no record of a prior credit.

int.name: ProgramAccountNotFound
int.label: Attempt to load a program that does not exist.

int.name: InsufficientFundsForFee
int.label: The fee payer `Pubkey` does not have sufficient balance to pay the fee to schedule the transaction.

int.name: InvalidAccountForFee
int.label: This account may not be used to pay transaction fees.

int.name: AlreadyProcessed
int.label: The bank has seen this transaction before. This can occur under normal operation when a UDP packet is duplicated, as a user error from a client not updating its `recent_blockhash`, or as a double-spend attack.

int.name: BlockhashNotFound
int.label: The bank has not seen the given `recent_blockhash` or the transaction is too old and the `recent_blockhash` has been discarded.

int.name: InstructionError
int.label: An error occurred while processing an instruction.

int.name: CallChainTooDeep
int.label: Loader call chain is too deep.

int.name: MissingSignatureForFee
int.label: Transaction requires a fee but has no signature present.

int.name: InvalidAccountIndex
int.label: Transaction contains an invalid account reference.

int.name: SignatureFailure
int.label: Transaction did not pass signature verification.

int.name: InvalidProgramForExecution
int.label: This program may not be used for executing instructions.

int.name: SanitizeFailure
int.label: Transaction failed to sanitize accounts offsets correctly implies that account locks are not taken for this TX, and should not be unlocked.

int.name: ClusterMaintenance
int.label: Transactions are currently disabled due to cluster maintenance.

int.name: AccountBorrowOutstanding
int.label: Transaction processing left an account with an outstanding borrowed reference.

int.name: WouldExceedMaxBlockCostLimit
int.label: Transaction would exceed max Block Cost Limit.

int.name: InvalidWritableAccount
int.label: Transaction loads a writable account that cannot be written.

int.name: WouldExceedMaxAccountCostLimit
int.label: Transaction would exceed max account limit within the block.

int.name: WouldExceedAccountDataBlockLimit
int.label: Transaction would exceed account data limit within the block.

int.name: InvalidAddressLookupTableOwner
int.label: Attempted to lookup addresses from an account owned by the wrong program.

int.name: InvalidAddressLookupTableData
int.label: Attempted to lookup addresses from an invalid account.

int.name: InvalidAddressLookupTableIndex
int.label: Address table lookup uses an invalid index.

int.name: InvalidRentPayingAccount
int.label: Transaction leaves an account with a lower balance than rent-exempt minimum.

int.name: WouldExceedMaxVoteCostLimit
int.label: Transaction would exceed max Vote Cost Limit.

int.name: WouldExceedAccountDataTotalLimit
int.label: Transaction would exceed total account data limit.

int.name: DuplicateInstruction
int.label: Transaction contains a duplicate instruction that is not allowed.

int.name: InsufficientFundsForRent
int.label: Transaction results in an account with insufficient funds for rent.

int.name: MaxLoadedAccountsDataSizeExceeded
int.label: Transaction exceeded max loaded accounts data size cap.

int.name: InvalidLoadedAccountsDataSizeLimit
int.label: LoadedAccountsDataSizeLimit set for transaction must be greater than 0.

int.name: ResanitizationNeeded
int.label: Sanitized transaction differed before/after feature activation. Needs to be resanitized.

int.name: ProgramExecutionTemporarilyRestricted
int.label: Program execution is temporarily restricted on an account.

int.name: UnbalancedTransaction
int.label: The total balance before the transaction does not equal the total balance after the transaction.

int.name: ProgramCacheHitMaxLimit
int.label: The total program cache size hit the maximum allowed limit.

int.name: CommitCancelled
int.label: The process for committing the transaction was cancelled internally.

int.name: BundlePeer
int.label: Transaction is part of a bundle and one of the peer transactions failed.

int.name: InstructonError
int.label: An error occurred while processing an instruction

int.name: AccountNotFound
int.label: The transaction fee payer address was not found

int.name: ProgramAccountNotFound
int.label: A program account referenced by the transaction was not found

int.name: InsufficientFundsForFee
int.label: The transaction fee payer did not have balance to pay the fee

int.name: InvalidAccountForFee
int.label: The transaction fee payer account is not owned by the system program, or has data that is not a nonce

int.name: AlreadyProcessed
int.label: The transaction has already been processed in a recent block

int.name: BlockhashNotFound
int.label: The transaction references a blockhash that is not recent, or advances a nonce with the wrong value

int.name: InvalidProgramForExecution
int.label: A program account referenced by the transaction was no executable. TODO: No longer needed with SIMD-0162

int.name: AddressLookupTableNotFound
int.label: The transaction references an ALUT account that does not exist or is inactive

int.name: InvalidAddressLookupTableOwner
int.label: The transaction references an ALUT account that is not owned by the ALUT program account

int.name: InvalidAddressLookupTableData
int.label: The transaction references an ALUT account that contains data which is not a valid ALUT

int.name: InvalidAddressLookupTableIndex
int.label: The transaction references an account offset from the ALUT which does not exist

int.name: MaxLoadedAccountsDataSizeExceeded
int.label: The total account data size of the loaded accounts exceeds the consensus limit

int.name: DuplicateInstruction
int.label: A compute budget program instruction was invoked more than once

int.name: InvalidLoadedAccountsDataSizeLimit
int.label: The compute budget program was invoked and set the loaded accounts data size to zero

int.name: NonceAlreadyAdvanced
int.label: The transaction references a nonce account that is already advanced

int.name: NonceAdvanceFailed
int.label: The transaction is a nonce transaction but the advance instruction was not valid or failed

int.name: NonceWrongBlockhash
int.label: The transaction is a nonce transaction but the blockhash is not the correct one

int.name: AccountInUse
int.label: The transaction conflicts with another transaction in the microblock. TODO: No longer possible with smart dispatcher

int.name: AccountLoadedTwice
int.label: The transaction references the same account twice

int.name: SignatureFailure
int.label: The transaction had an invalid signature

int.name: TooManyAccountLocks
int.label: The transaction references too many accounts. TODO: No longer possible with smart dispatcher

int.name: InsufficientFundsForRent
int.label: The transaction would leave an account with a lower balance than the rent-exempt minimum

int.name: UnbalancedTransaction
int.label: The total referenced account lamports before and after the transaction was unbalanced

int.name: BundlePeer
int.label: The transaction was part of a bundle and an earlier transaction in the bundle failed

int.name: LandedFeesOnly
int.label: Transaction landed, but was fees only and did not execute

int.name: LandedFailed
int.label: Transaction landed, but failed to execute

counter.name: TransactionResult
counter.summary: Result of loading and executing a transaction.

counter.name: TransactionLanded
counter.summary: Whether a transaction landed in the block or not.

counter.name: TransactionSanitizeFailure
counter.summary: Number of transactions that failed to sanitize.

counter.name: TransactionNotExecutedFailure
counter.summary: Number of transactions that did not execute. This is different than transactions which fail to execute, which make it onto the chain.

counter.name: TransactionLoadAddressTables
counter.summary: Result of loading address lookup tables for a transaction. If there are multiple errors for the transaction, only the first one is reported.

counter.name: TransactionResult
counter.summary: Result of loading and executing a transaction.

counter.name: ProcessingFailed
counter.summary: Count of transactions for which the processing stage failed and won't land on chain

counter.name: FeeOnlyTransactions
counter.summary: Count of transactions that will land on chain but without executing

counter.name: ExecutedFailedTransactions
counter.summary: Count of transactions that execute on chain but failed

counter.name: SuccessfulTransactions
counter.summary: Count of transactions that execute on chain and succeed

counter.name: CostModelUndercount
counter.summary: Count of transactions that used more CUs than the cost model should have permitted them to

histogram.name: BeginLeaderDelaySeconds
histogram.summary: Delay between when we become leader in a slot and when we receive the bank.

histogram.name: FirstMicroblockDelaySeconds
histogram.summary: Delay between when we become leader in a slot and when we receive the first microblock.

histogram.name: SlotDoneDelaySeconds
histogram.summary: Delay between when we become leader in a slot and when we finish the slot.

histogram.name: BundleInitializeDelaySeconds
histogram.summary: Delay in starting the slot caused by loading the information needed to generate the bundle crank transactions

int.name: BadSlot
int.label: Shred was for a slot for which we don't know the leader

int.name: Rejected
int.label: Shred was invalid for one of many reasons

int.name: Ignored
int.label: Shred was ignored because we had already received or reconstructed it

int.name: Okay
int.label: Shred accepted to an incomplete FEC set

int.name: Completes
int.label: Shred accepted and resulted in a valid, complete FEC set

histogram.name: ClusterContactInfoCnt
histogram.summary: Number of contact infos in the cluster contact info message

counter.name: MicroblocksAbandoned
counter.summary: The number of microblocks that were abandoned because we switched slots without finishing the current slot

counter.name: InvalidBlockId
counter.summary: The number of times a block was created with unknown parent block_id

histogram.name: BatchSz
histogram.summary: The size (in bytes) of each microblock batch that is shredded

histogram.name: BatchMicroblockCnt
histogram.summary: The number of microblocks in each microblock batch that is shredded

histogram.name: ShreddingDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of producing one FEC set from the shredder

histogram.name: AddShredDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of verifying and processing one shred received from the network

counter.name: ShredProcessed
counter.summary: The result of processing a shred from the network

counter.name: FecSetSpilled
counter.summary: The number of FEC sets that were spilled because they didn't complete in time and we needed space

counter.name: ShredRejectedInitial
counter.summary: The number of shreds that were rejected before any resources were allocated for the FEC set

counter.name: ShredRejectedUnchained
counter.summary: The number of shreds that were rejected because they're not chained merkle shreds

counter.name: FecRejectedFatal
counter.summary: The number of FEC sets that were rejected for reasons that cause the whole FEC set to become invalid

counter.name: ForceCompleteRequest
counter.summary: The number of times we received a FEC force complete message

counter.name: ForceCompleteFailure
counter.summary: The number of times we failed to force complete a FEC set on request

counter.name: ForceCompleteSuccess
counter.summary: The number of times we successfully forced completed a FEC set on request

counter.name: ShredOutRcv
counter.summary: The number of times we received a repair shred

counter.name: ShredTurbineRcv
counter.summary: The number of times we received a turbine shred

histogram.name: StoreInsertWait
histogram.summary: Time in seconds spent waiting for the store to insert a new FEC set

histogram.name: StoreInsertWork
histogram.summary: Time in seconds spent on inserting a new FEC set

counter.name: TransactionsInserted
counter.summary: Count of transactions produced while we were leader in the shreds that have been inserted so far

histogram.name: StoreLinkWait
histogram.summary: Time in seconds spent waiting for the store to link a new FEC set

histogram.name: StoreLinkWork
histogram.summary: Time in seconds spent on linking a new FEC set

histogram.name: StoreReadWait
histogram.summary: Time in seconds spent waiting for the store to read a FEC set

histogram.name: StoreReadWork
histogram.summary: Time in seconds spent on reading a FEC set

histogram.name: StorePublishWait
histogram.summary: Time in seconds spent waiting for the store to publish a new FEC set

histogram.name: StorePublishWork
histogram.summary: Time in seconds spent on publishing a new FEC set

gauge.name: RootSlot
gauge.summary: The slot at which our node has most recently rooted

gauge.name: RootDistance
gauge.summary: The distance in slots between our current root and the current reset slot

gauge.name: LeaderSlot
gauge.summary: The slot at which we are currently leader, or 0 if none

gauge.name: NextLeaderSlot
gauge.summary: The slot at which we are next leader, or 0 if none. If we are currently leader, this is the same as the current leader slot

gauge.name: ResetSlot
gauge.summary: The slot at which we last reset the replay stage, or 0 if unknown

gauge.name: MaxLiveBanks
gauge.summary: The maximum number of banks we can have alive

gauge.name: LiveBanks
gauge.summary: The number of banks we currently have alive

counter.name: SlotsTotal
counter.summary: Count of slots replayed successfully

counter.name: TransactionsTotal
counter.summary: Count of transactions processed overall on the current fork

gauge.name: FirstTurbineSlot
gauge.label: The first slot for which we have received a turbine shred

gauge.name: CurrentTurbineSlot
gauge.label: The latest slot for which we have received a turbine shred

counter.name: TotalPktCount
counter.summary: How many network packets we have sent, including reqs, pings, pongs, etc.

counter.name: SentPktTypes
counter.summary: What types of client messages are we sending

counter.name: RepairedSlots
counter.summary: Until which slots have we fully repaired

counter.name: CurrentSlot
counter.summary: Our view of the current cluster slot, max slot received

counter.name: RequestPeers
counter.summary: How many peers have we requested

counter.name: SignTileUnavail
counter.summary: How many times no sign tiles were available to send request

counter.name: EagerRepairAggresses
counter.summary: How many times we pass eager repair threshold

counter.name: RerequestQueue
counter.summary: How many times we re-request a shred from the inflights queue

counter.name: MalformedPing
counter.summary: How many times we received a malformed ping

histogram.name: SlotCompleteTime
histogram.summary: Time in seconds it took to complete a slot

histogram.name: ResponseLatency
histogram.summary: Time in nanoseconds it took to receive a repair request response

histogram.name: SignDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of signing a message

int.name: Staked
int.label: Pong ignored as node is staked

int.name: Entrypoint
int.label: Pong ignored as node is an entrypoint

int.name: Untracked
int.label: Pong ignored as node has no outstanding ping

int.name: Address
int.label: Pong ignored as responding node doesn't match pinged address

int.name: Token
int.label: Pong ignored as token was not valid

int.name: Unpinged
int.label: Peer is known but has not been pinged yet

int.name: Invalid
int.label: Peer was pinged but has not yet responded, or responded with an invalid pong

int.name: Valid
int.label: Peer was pinged and is currently valid

int.name: ValidRefreshing
int.label: Peer was pinged and is currently valid, and is being refreshed with a new ping

int.name: DroppedPullResponseStale
int.label: Pull Response (newer entry already present in table)

int.name: DroppedPullResponseWallclock
int.label: Pull Response (outside expiry window and no contact info entry)

int.name: DroppedPushStale
int.label: Push (newer entry already present in table)

counter.name: PingTrackerCapacity
counter.label: The peer tracking capacity of the ping tracker

gauge.name: PingTrackerCount
gauge.label: The number of peers being tracked for ping/pong

counter.name: PingTrackerPongResult
counter.label: The result of processing a pong response to a ping

counter.name: PingTrackerEvictedCount
counter.label: The number of peers evicted from the ping tracker to make space for new peers

counter.name: PingTrackedCount
counter.label: The total number of peers ever tracked for ping/pong

counter.name: PingTrackerStakeChangedCount
counter.label: The number of times a tracked peer was removed from tracking as it became staked

counter.name: PingTrackerAddressChangedCount
counter.label: The number of times a tracked peer was removed from tracking as it's gossip address changed

gauge.name: CrdsCapacity
gauge.label: The capacity of the data store

gauge.name: CrdsCount
gauge.label: The number of entries in the data store

counter.name: CrdsExpiredCount
counter.label: The number of entries expired from the data store due to age

counter.name: CrdsEvictedCount
counter.label: The number of entries evicted from the data store to make space for new entries

gauge.name: CrdsPeerCapacity
gauge.label: The capacity for storing peers in the data store

gauge.name: CrdsPeerStakedCount
gauge.label: The number of staked peers in the data store

gauge.name: CrdsPeerUnstakedCount
gauge.label: The number of unstaked peers in the data store

gauge.name: CrdsPeerTotalStake
gauge.label: The total visible stake in the data store, in lamports

counter.name: CrdsPeerEvictedCount
counter.label: The number of peers evicted from the data store to make space for new peers

gauge.name: CrdsPurgedCapacity
gauge.label: The capacity of the list of purged data store entries

gauge.name: CrdsPurgedCount
gauge.label: The number of purged data store entries

counter.name: CrdsPurgedExpiredCount
counter.label: The number of purged entries expired from the purged list due to age

counter.name: CrdsPurgedEvictedCount
counter.label: The number of purged entries evicted from the data store to make space for new entries

counter.name: ContactInfoUnrecognizedSocketTags
counter.label: The number of unrecognized socket tags seen in Contact Infos

counter.name: ContactInfoIpv6
counter.label: The number of IPv6 addresses seen in Contact Infos

counter.name: CrdsRxCount
counter.label: Outcome of incoming CRDS messages

counter.name: MessageTxCount
counter.label: Number of gossip messages sent

counter.name: MessageTxBytes
counter.label: Total wire bytes sent in gossip messages

counter.name: CrdsTxPushCount
counter.label: Number of CRDS values sent in push messages

counter.name: CrdsTxPushBytes
counter.label: Total wire bytes of CRDS sent out in push messages

counter.name: CrdsTxPullResponseCount
counter.label: Number of CRDS values sent in pull response messages

counter.name: CrdsTxPullResponseBytes
counter.label: Total wire bytes of CRDS sent out in pull response messages

counter.name: MessageRxCount
counter.label: Number of gossip messages processed

counter.name: MessageRxBytes
counter.label: Total wire bytes of gossip messages processed

counter.name: CrdsRxCount
counter.label: Number of CRDS values processed

counter.name: CrdsRxBytes
counter.label: Total wire bytes of CRDS values processed

histogram.name: SignDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of signing a message

counter.name: DropEvents
counter.summary: Number of netlink drop events caught

counter.name: LinkFullSyncs
counter.summary: Number of full link table syncs done

counter.name: RouteFullSyncs
counter.summary: Number of full route table syncs done

counter.name: Updates
counter.summary: Number of netlink live updates processed

gauge.name: InterfaceCount
gauge.summary: Number of network interfaces

gauge.name: RouteCount
gauge.summary: Number of IPv4 routes

counter.name: NeighProbeSent
counter.summary: Number of neighbor solicit requests sent to kernel

counter.name: NeighProbeFails
counter.summary: Number of neighbor solicit requests that failed to send (kernel too slow)

counter.name: NeighProbeRateLimitHost
counter.summary: Number of neighbor solicit that exceeded the per-host rate limit

counter.name: NeighProbeRateLimitGlobal
counter.summary: Number of neighbor solicit that exceeded the global rate limit

gauge.name: State
gauge.summary: State of the tile

counter.name: FullNumRetries
counter.summary: Number of times we aborted and retried full snapshot download because the peer was too slow

counter.name: IncrementalNumRetries
counter.summary: Number of times we aborted and retried incremental snapshot download because the peer was too slow

gauge.name: FullBytesRead
gauge.summary: Number of bytes read so far from the full snapshot. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: FullBytesWritten
gauge.summary: Number of bytes written so far from the full snapshot. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: FullBytesTotal
gauge.summary: Total size of the full snapshot file. Might change if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: FullDownloadRetries
gauge.summary: Number of times we retried the full snapshot download because the peer was too slow

gauge.name: IncrementalBytesRead
gauge.summary: Number of bytes read so far from the incremental snapshot. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: IncrementalBytesWritten
gauge.summary: Number of bytes written so far from the incremental snapshot. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: IncrementalBytesTotal
gauge.summary: Total size of the incremental snapshot file. Might change if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: IncrementalDownloadRetries
gauge.summary: Number of times we retried the incremental snapshot download because the peer was too slow

gauge.name: PredictedSlot
gauge.summary: The predicted slot from which replay starts after snapshot loading finishes. Might change if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: GossipFreshCount
gauge.summary: Number of fresh gossip peers seen when collecting gossip peers.

gauge.name: GossipTotalCount
gauge.summary: Number of total gossip peers seen when collecting gossip peers.

gauge.name: State
gauge.summary: State of the tile. 0=IDLE, 1=PROCESSING, 2=FINISHING, 3=ERROR, 4=SHUTDOWN

gauge.name: State
gauge.summary: State of the tile. 0=IDLE, 1=PROCESSING, 2=FINISHING, 3=ERROR, 4=SHUTDOWN

gauge.name: FullCompressedBytesRead
gauge.summary: Number of bytes read so far from the compressed full snapshot file. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: FullDecompressedBytesRead
gauge.summary: Number of bytes read so far from the decompressed file. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: IncrementalCompressedBytesRead
gauge.summary: Number of bytes read so far from the compressed incremental snapshot file. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: IncrementalDecompressedBytesRead
gauge.summary: Number of bytes read so far from the decompressed incremental snapshot file. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: State
gauge.summary: State of the tile. 0=IDLE, 1=PROCESSING, 2=FINISHING, 3=ERROR, 4=SHUTDOWN

gauge.name: FullBytesRead
gauge.summary: Number of bytes read so far from the full snapshot. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: IncrementalBytesRead
gauge.summary: Number of bytes read so far from the incremental snapshot. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: AccountsInserted
gauge.summary: Number of accounts inserted during snapshot loading. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: State
gauge.summary: State of the tile. 0=IDLE, 1=PROCESSING, 4=SHUTDOWN

gauge.name: VinylBytesWritten
gauge.summary: Number of bytes written so far to the vinyl snapshot file. Might decrease if snapshot creation is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: State
gauge.summary: State of the tile. 0=IDLE, 1=PROCESSING, 4=SHUTDOWN

gauge.name: State
gauge.summary: State of the tile. 0=IDLE, 1=PROCESSING, 2=FINISHING, 3=ERROR, 4=SHUTDOWN

gauge.name: FullAccountsHashed
gauge.summary: Number of accounts hashed for the full snapshot during snapshot loading. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: IncrementalAccountsHashed
gauge.summary: Number of accounts hashed for the incremental snapshot during snapshot loading. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: State
gauge.summary: State of the tile. 0=IDLE, 1=PROCESSING, 2=FINISHING, 3=ERROR, 4=SHUTDOWN

gauge.name: FullAccountsHashed
gauge.summary: Number of accounts hashed for the full snapshot during snapshot loading. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: IncrementalAccountsHashed
gauge.summary: Number of accounts hashed for the incremental snapshot during snapshot loading. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gauge.name: BootTimestampNanos
gauge.summary: Timestamp when validator was started (nanoseconds since epoch)

gauge.name: ShredVersion
gauge.summary: The current shred version used by the validator

gauge.name: ConnectionCount
gauge.summary: The number of active connections to the ipecho service

counter.name: ConnectionsClosedOk
counter.summary: The number of connections to the ipecho service that have been made and closed normally

counter.name: ConnectionsClosedError
counter.summary: The number of connections to the ipecho service that have been made and closed abnormally

counter.name: BytesRead
counter.summary: The total number of bytes read from all connections to the ipecho service

counter.name: BytesWritten
counter.summary: The total number of bytes written to all connections to the ipecho service

gauge.name: FinalSlot
gauge.summary: The slot after which the backtest will complete

gauge.name: StartSlot
gauge.summary: The slot at which the backtest started

counter.name: ProgcacheMisses
counter.summary: Number of program cache misses

counter.name: ProgcacheHits
counter.summary: Number of program cache hits

counter.name: ProgcacheFills
counter.summary: Number of program cache insertions

counter.name: ProgcacheFillTotSz
counter.summary: Total number of bytes inserted into program cache

counter.name: ProgcacheFillFails
counter.summary: Number of program cache load fails (tombstones inserted)

counter.name: ProgcacheDupInserts
counter.summary: Number of time two tiles raced to insert the same cache entry

counter.name: ProgcacheInvalidations
counter.summary: Number of program cache invalidations

counter.name: TransactionsSent
counter.summary: Number of benchmark packets sent

counter.name: VoteTxnInvalid
counter.summary: Number of times we dropped a vote txn because it was invalid (malformed, bad signature, etc.)

counter.name: VoteTxnIgnored
counter.summary: Number of times we ignored all or part of a vote txn because we didn't recognize a slot (eg. our replay was behind)

counter.name: VoteTxnMismatch
counter.summary: Number of times a vote txn mismatched our own block id

counter.name: AncestorRollback
counter.summary: Rollback to an ancestor of our prev vote (can't vote)

counter.name: SiblingConfirmed
counter.summary: Duplicate sibling got confirmed (can't vote)

counter.name: SameFork
counter.summary: Same fork as prev vote (can vote)

counter.name: SwitchPass
counter.summary: Prev vote was on a different fork, but we are allowed to switch (can vote)

counter.name: SwitchFail
counter.summary: Prev vote was on a different fork, and we are not allowed to switch (can't vote)

counter.name: LockoutFail
counter.summary: Locked out (can't vote)

counter.name: ThresholdFail
counter.summary: Did not pass threshold check (can't vote)

counter.name: PropagatedFail
counter.summary: Prev leader block did not propagate (can't vote)
